biography: Tommy, a familiar face from Espoo Ringside Golf, brings a blend of stoicism and understated skill to the greens. While some might find him reserved, those who know him understand that his focus is laser-locked on the game at hand.

Tommy has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée twice, and anticipation is building as he is preparing to make his third appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his consistent performance suggests that he is always a formidable competitor in this event.
